About Us

The Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis (formerly the Canadian College of Kineseography) was founded in the 1980s in Toronto.

The technical side of handwriting analysis is referred to as forensic handwriting examination and here we examine and compare signatures, handwriting and printing.  

We are experts in the field of forgery detection and court qualified in Ontario, Quebec, Alberta and Newfoundland. We can detect alterations by analyzing handwriting and signatures. 

There are several reasons why documents are questioned and disputed, but most of these disputes relate to fraud, alleged revisions, holographic wills, typewritten documents and anonymous letters.

With over 30 years of experience, we maintain high standards and strive constantly to meet the specific needs of our customers. With forensic handwriting examination and handwriting analysis services of the highest quality in Canada, our handwriting experts are highly accredited, certified and court-qualified.

We can provide expert witness testimony in court and have prepared hundreds of forensic reports for our clients. With the necessary skills and experience, our forensic handwriting examiners prepare forensic reports that have been accepted by courts across Canada.

We can help you if you have a suspect signature on a will or a holographic will, real estate forms, threatening notes, anonymous letters, mortgages, insurance forms, business contracts and more.

Call us today at (416) 921-6377 for further information or email us at: canadian@cchwa.ca.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”1014″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
